David Chen David Chen 3d
I've been living in this city for 10 years now, and I want to share my ultimate guide to the best hidden gems. First, there's the little coffee shop on Oak Street that nobody knows about. They roast their own beans and the owner is from Ethiopia originally. The espresso is incredible. Then there's the bookstore on Maple Ave that has a secret room in the back with rare first editions. I found a signed Hemingway there once. Don't even get me started on the underground music scene here...
